text: FC Kolos Buchach was an amateur football team based in a small city of Buchach, Ukrainian SSR. ==History== Notable the club became after 1965 when head coach of another amateur club Karpaty Broshniv-Osada (Ivano-Frankivsk Oblast), Petro Savchuk was invited to lead Kolos Buchach. Along with the coach, number of Karpaty's footballers moved to Kolos as well. ==Honors== Ukrainian championship for collective teams of physical culture * Winners (1): 1968Kolos Buchach. Footballfacts.ru * Runners-up (1): 1966 Ternopil Oblast football championship * Winners (8):Yuriy Malyshev. Nostalgia for the past (Ностальгія за минулим). Ukrainian Association of Football. 27 September 2010 1966, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1972, 1973 * Runners-up (1): 2006 ==Coaches== * 1965–1973 Petro Savchuk ==References== Category:Football clubs in Ternopil Oblast Category:Defunct football clubs in Ukraine Category:Kolos (sports society)
title: FC Kolos Buchach
